#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test, *arr, n, i, num,ans;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        arr=new int[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&num);
            arr[i]=3*num;
        }
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&num);
            arr[i]=arr[i]+num;
        }
        ans=*max_element(arr,arr+n);
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
